text:
2021 Porsche Cayenne E-Hybrid, Turbo S E-Hybrid gain larger batteries. Porsche’s range of 2021 Cayenne E-Hybrid models (the PHEVs) are getting higher capacity battery packs next year.
It's the same battery pack improvement that we saw with the updated 2021 Panamera E-Hybrid range.
Cayennes with this new pack for 2021 include the E-Hybrid, E-Hybrid Coupe, Turbo S E-Hybrid and the Turbo S E-Hybrid Coupe.
The more powerful and heavier Turbo S E-Hybrid was rated for 12 miles, so expect it to be about 15 miles for 2021.
The updated 2021 Cayenne E-Hybrid models are available to order now, and Porsche expects them to arrive in dealerships come spring 2021.
Headline: 2021 Porsche Cayenne E-Hybrid, Turbo S E-Hybrid gain larger batteries
Summary:
Porsche’s range of 2021 Cayenne E-Hybrid models (the PHEVs) are getting higher capacity battery packs next year.
It's the same battery pack improvement that we saw with the updated 2021 Panamera E-Hybrid range.
Cayennes with this new pack for 2021 include the E-Hybrid, E-Hybrid Coupe, Turbo S E-Hybrid and the Turbo S E-Hybrid Coupe.
The more powerful and heavier Turbo S E-Hybrid was rated for 12 miles, so expect it to be about 15 miles for 2021.
The updated 2021 Cayenne E-Hybrid models are available to order now, and Porsche expects them to arrive in dealerships come spring 2021.

text:
Extreme E pushes off-road racing start to March 2021. Extreme E has pushed back the start date for its off-road electric motorsport.
The first race weekend will now take place on March 20th and 21st in Saudi Arabia, though.
In a press release, Extreme E’s organizers said the delay and location switch was partly due to the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.
Although the teams won’t be racing in Nepal this year, “series organisers remain committed to a visit in future Extreme E seasons.”Mark your calendars...
Formula 1 stars Lewis Hamilton and Nico Rosberg are both fielding teams, though neither will actually be racing.
Headline: Extreme E pushes off-road racing start to March 2021
Summary:
Extreme E has pushed back the start date for its off-road electric motorsport.
The first race weekend will now take place on March 20th and 21st in Saudi Arabia, though.
In a press release, Extreme E’s organizers said the delay and location switch was partly due to the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.
Although the teams won’t be racing in Nepal this year, “series organisers remain committed to a visit in future Extreme E seasons.”Mark your calendars...
Formula 1 stars Lewis Hamilton and Nico Rosberg are both fielding teams, though neither will actually be racing.

text:
Fiat Chrysler posts record Q3 profit thanks to U.S. trucks and Jeep. MILAN — A rebound in car production in Fiat Chrysler on Wednesday reported record third-quarter earnings as production returned to nearly pre-pandemic levels.
The Italian-American automaker, which is finalizing its full merger with French rival PSA Peugeot, reported a net profit in the three months ending Sept. 30 of $1.4 billion (1.2 billion euros).
The carmaker reported adjusted earnings before tax and interest in North America of 2.5 billion euros.
“Our record results were driven by our team’s tremendous performance in North America,” CEO Mike Manley said in a statement.
Overall, the carmaker said global earnings before tax and interest were a record 2.3 billion euros despite a 6% fall in revenues to 26 billion euros.
Headline: Fiat Chrysler posts record Q3 profit thanks to U.S. trucks and Jeep
Summary:
MILAN — A rebound in car production in Fiat Chrysler on Wednesday reported record third-quarter earnings as production returned to nearly pre-pandemic levels.
The Italian-American automaker, which is finalizing its full merger with French rival PSA Peugeot, reported a net profit in the three months ending Sept. 30 of $1.4 billion (1.2 billion euros).
The carmaker reported adjusted earnings before tax and interest in North America of 2.5 billion euros.
“Our record results were driven by our team’s tremendous performance in North America,” CEO Mike Manley said in a statement.
Overall, the carmaker said global earnings before tax and interest were a record 2.3 billion euros despite a 6% fall in revenues to 26 billion euros.

text:
2021 Honda Odyssey | Reviews, price, specs, features and photos. New tech features include a third-row USB port on the Touring and Elite trims, and a rear seat reminder system on all trim levels.
The forward collision warning system has also been enhanced to detect pedestrians, while the adaptive cruise control system can work in stop-and-go traffic.
It's best to think of the 2021 Honda Odyssey as the ultimate piece of parenting gear rather than a car.
The Odyssey differs with its "Magic Slide" second-row seats found on all but the base LX.
This includes things like the Honda Vac, CabinTalk and CabinWatch, in-car WiFi, and the rear seat entertainment system.
Headline: 2021 Honda Odyssey | Reviews, price, specs, features and photos
Summary:
New tech features include a third-row USB port on the Touring and Elite trims, and a rear seat reminder system on all trim levels.
The forward collision warning system has also been enhanced to detect pedestrians, while the adaptive cruise control system can work in stop-and-go traffic.
It's best to think of the 2021 Honda Odyssey as the ultimate piece of parenting gear rather than a car.
The Odyssey differs with its "Magic Slide" second-row seats found on all but the base LX.
This includes things like the Honda Vac, CabinTalk and CabinWatch, in-car WiFi, and the rear seat entertainment system.

text:
GM Super Cruise beats Tesla Autopilot again in latest hands-free test. DETROIT — General Motors' Super Cruise once again edged Tesla's Autopilot in an evaluation of 17 vehicles equipped with active driving assistance systems (ADAS) by Consumer Reports, the testing organization said on Wednesday.
A Tesla Model Y fitted with Autopilot finished "a distant second," the group said, to a Cadillac CT6 equipped with Super Cruise, which GM is rolling out to more than 20 vehicles — including its new Hummer electric pickup truck — over the next three years.
In 2018, the Cadillac CT6 with Super Cruise scored higher than a Tesla Model 3 with Autopilot, in a Consumer Reports test of just four vehicles equipped with ADAS.
In the latest test, conducted this summer on a track and on public roads, the Cadillac scored 69 points out of a possible 100, while the Tesla scored 57.
The group noted that Autopilot can shut off abruptly in some situations, while Super Cruise did a better job of notifying the driver when the system is disengaging.
Headline: GM Super Cruise beats Tesla Autopilot again in latest hands-free test
Summary:
DETROIT — General Motors' Super Cruise once again edged Tesla's Autopilot in an evaluation of 17 vehicles equipped with active driving assistance systems (ADAS) by Consumer Reports, the testing organization said on Wednesday.
A Tesla Model Y fitted with Autopilot finished "a distant second," the group said, to a Cadillac CT6 equipped with Super Cruise, which GM is rolling out to more than 20 vehicles — including its new Hummer electric pickup truck — over the next three years.
In 2018, the Cadillac CT6 with Super Cruise scored higher than a Tesla Model 3 with Autopilot, in a Consumer Reports test of just four vehicles equipped with ADAS.
In the latest test, conducted this summer on a track and on public roads, the Cadillac scored 69 points out of a possible 100, while the Tesla scored 57.
The group noted that Autopilot can shut off abruptly in some situations, while Super Cruise did a better job of notifying the driver when the system is disengaging.

text:
Mini pegs its future on crossovers, electric cars, and the Chinese market. "Harnessing new target groups and sales markets will be crucially important for the future of Mini," stressed company boss Bernd Körber.
That's why every new model from our brand in the future will be unmistakably a Mini," Körber stated.
Finally, the alliance with Great Wall Motors will give Mini the opportunity to sell more cars on the Chinese market by building them locally and skirting import tariffs.
It noted the cars it will build in China will be electric, and they'll be based on a new architecture developed exclusively for electric models.
This rules out the aforementioned electric Hardtop, but it doesn't exclude the X1-sized crossover that's currently being developed.
Headline: Mini pegs its future on crossovers, electric cars, and the Chinese market
Summary:
"Harnessing new target groups and sales markets will be crucially important for the future of Mini," stressed company boss Bernd Körber.
That's why every new model from our brand in the future will be unmistakably a Mini," Körber stated.
Finally, the alliance with Great Wall Motors will give Mini the opportunity to sell more cars on the Chinese market by building them locally and skirting import tariffs.
It noted the cars it will build in China will be electric, and they'll be based on a new architecture developed exclusively for electric models.
This rules out the aforementioned electric Hardtop, but it doesn't exclude the X1-sized crossover that's currently being developed.

text:
Bugatti introduces Bolide race car with 1,824 horsepower. Bugatti proudly calls the Bolide — which means "a very fast car" in French — the fastest and lightest concept it has ever built.
Concept is the key term here; the Bolide is a one-off, and it has not been approved for production yet.
Stephan Winkelmann, the head of Bugatti, said driving the Bolide is "like riding a cannonball."
Created in eight months, the Bolide benefits from an array of weight-saving techniques, including some not found in production cars.
Bugatti still hasn't decided whether to build the Bolide.
Headline: Bugatti introduces Bolide race car with 1,824 horsepower
Summary:
Bugatti proudly calls the Bolide — which means "a very fast car" in French — the fastest and lightest concept it has ever built.
Concept is the key term here; the Bolide is a one-off, and it has not been approved for production yet.
Stephan Winkelmann, the head of Bugatti, said driving the Bolide is "like riding a cannonball."
Created in eight months, the Bolide benefits from an array of weight-saving techniques, including some not found in production cars.
Bugatti still hasn't decided whether to build the Bolide.

text:
2021 Jaguar E-Pace updated with new infotainment, more powerful trim. As with other Jaguars including the F-Pace and XF, the littlest 2021 Jaguar E-Pace is getting an update.
Inside, the center stack has been revised with new knobs and switches below a big 11.4-inch touchscreen that features the latest Jaguar infotainment system.
The P250 and P250 SE get a turbocharged, 2.0-liter four-cylinder making 246 horsepower.
The P300 Sport augments its all-wheel drive with torque vectoring for the rear wheels.
The base P250 E-Pace starts at $42,045, the P250 SE at $47,145, and the P300 Sport at $51,045.
Headline: 2021 Jaguar E-Pace updated with new infotainment, more powerful trim
Summary:
As with other Jaguars including the F-Pace and XF, the littlest 2021 Jaguar E-Pace is getting an update.
Inside, the center stack has been revised with new knobs and switches below a big 11.4-inch touchscreen that features the latest Jaguar infotainment system.
The P250 and P250 SE get a turbocharged, 2.0-liter four-cylinder making 246 horsepower.
The P300 Sport augments its all-wheel drive with torque vectoring for the rear wheels.
The base P250 E-Pace starts at $42,045, the P250 SE at $47,145, and the P300 Sport at $51,045.

text:
Mercedes-Benz to boost stake in Aston Martin to 20%, lend it some tech. Daimler unit Mercedes-Benz is to lift its stake in Britain's Aston Martin to up to 20% by 2023, making it one of the struggling British carmaker's largest shareholders, Aston said on Tuesday.
The stock issued to the German group will have a maximum value of 286 million pounds ($372.7 million), it said.
The deal will see an existing supply agreement between the two firms, in place since 2013, expanded to give Aston Martin access to key Mercedes' technology, including hybrid and electric drive systems.
Aston Martin is targeting annual capex of 250 million pounds to 300 million pounds per year between 2021 and 2025.
It envisages production volumes of about 10,000 units, revenues of about 2 billion pounds and adjusted core profit of 500 million pounds by financial years 2024 or 2025.
Headline: Mercedes-Benz to boost stake in Aston Martin to 20%, lend it some tech
Summary:
Daimler unit Mercedes-Benz is to lift its stake in Britain's Aston Martin to up to 20% by 2023, making it one of the struggling British carmaker's largest shareholders, Aston said on Tuesday.
The stock issued to the German group will have a maximum value of 286 million pounds ($372.7 million), it said.
The deal will see an existing supply agreement between the two firms, in place since 2013, expanded to give Aston Martin access to key Mercedes' technology, including hybrid and electric drive systems.
Aston Martin is targeting annual capex of 250 million pounds to 300 million pounds per year between 2021 and 2025.
It envisages production volumes of about 10,000 units, revenues of about 2 billion pounds and adjusted core profit of 500 million pounds by financial years 2024 or 2025.

text:
2020 Volvo S60 T8 long-term update | Impressions, handling, braking. Our 2020 Volvo S60 T8 Inscription has racked up just over 15,000 miles so far in the Autoblog long-term fleet.
But there’s one thing we’ve done even less often, and that’s drive it for pleasure.
Every few miles, there’s a recognizable scenic byway – Skyline Drive, the Blue Ridge Parkway – and if it weren’t for the Commonwealth’s aggressive speed enforcement, it would be a driver’s paradise.
Mass is mass, and small though the Volvo may be it’s still quite hefty, and this becomes apparent in longer downhill stretches.
If the mission of a sport sedan is to both eat up mileage and competently navigate a technical back road, well, the S60 aces that test.
Headline: 2020 Volvo S60 T8 long-term update | Impressions, handling, braking
Summary:
Our 2020 Volvo S60 T8 Inscription has racked up just over 15,000 miles so far in the Autoblog long-term fleet.
But there’s one thing we’ve done even less often, and that’s drive it for pleasure.
Every few miles, there’s a recognizable scenic byway – Skyline Drive, the Blue Ridge Parkway – and if it weren’t for the Commonwealth’s aggressive speed enforcement, it would be a driver’s paradise.
Mass is mass, and small though the Volvo may be it’s still quite hefty, and this becomes apparent in longer downhill stretches.
If the mission of a sport sedan is to both eat up mileage and competently navigate a technical back road, well, the S60 aces that test.

text:
GM Infantry Squad Vehicle is done, first truck delivered to U.S. Army. The first GM Defense Infantry Squad Vehicle was just delivered to the U.S. Army.
With that delivery, we gain our first chance at seeing the final production truck.
Most shocking of all is the time it took GM to develop this truck.
“We’re leveraging General Motors’ engineering prowess and immense manufacturing capabilities to bring transformative solutions to the military vehicle market.
“The value we bring to our Army customer is our willingness to listen and adapt,” said Mark Dickens, GM Defense chief engineer.
Headline: GM Infantry Squad Vehicle is done, first truck delivered to U.S. Army
Summary:
The first GM Defense Infantry Squad Vehicle was just delivered to the U.S. Army.
With that delivery, we gain our first chance at seeing the final production truck.
Most shocking of all is the time it took GM to develop this truck.
“We’re leveraging General Motors’ engineering prowess and immense manufacturing capabilities to bring transformative solutions to the military vehicle market.
“The value we bring to our Army customer is our willingness to listen and adapt,” said Mark Dickens, GM Defense chief engineer.

text:
Aston Martin and Mercedes-Benz expand collaboration. Aston Martin on Tuesday expanded a deal with Daimler to access the German automaker's technology, including its hybrid and electric drive systems, in exchange for new shares as the struggling British luxury carmaker's new boss drives changes.
The new shares issued would increase the size of Mercedes-Benz's stake to no more than 20% by 2023 from the current 2.6% in several stages.
"We take another major step forward as our long-term partnership with Mercedes-Benz AG moves to another level with them becoming one of the Company's largest shareholders," said Chairman Lawrence Stroll.
The German firm would get the right to nominate one non-executive director to Aston Martin's board after its first shareholding increase.
The James Bond car maker, which has started deliveries of its first sport utility vehicle, the DBX, reported third-quarter adjusted core loss of 29 million pounds compared with a profit of 43 million pounds last year and revenue that nearly halved to 124 million pounds.
Headline: Aston Martin and Mercedes-Benz expand collaboration
Summary:
Aston Martin on Tuesday expanded a deal with Daimler to access the German automaker's technology, including its hybrid and electric drive systems, in exchange for new shares as the struggling British luxury carmaker's new boss drives changes.
The new shares issued would increase the size of Mercedes-Benz's stake to no more than 20% by 2023 from the current 2.6% in several stages.
"We take another major step forward as our long-term partnership with Mercedes-Benz AG moves to another level with them becoming one of the Company's largest shareholders," said Chairman Lawrence Stroll.
The German firm would get the right to nominate one non-executive director to Aston Martin's board after its first shareholding increase.
The James Bond car maker, which has started deliveries of its first sport utility vehicle, the DBX, reported third-quarter adjusted core loss of 29 million pounds compared with a profit of 43 million pounds last year and revenue that nearly halved to 124 million pounds.

text:
Harley-Davidson announces Serial 1 Cycle Company e-bike brand. It was founded by a group of cycling enthusiasts employed by Harley-Davidson, and every member of its executive team has previously held a top-level position at the motorcycle manufacturer.
Harley-Davidson has created a sub-brand named Serial 1 Cycle Company to enter the e-bike segment.
Regardless, the first Serial 1 e-bike is a retro-styled model that draws design inspiration from the 1903 Serial Number One, which is the oldest-known Harley-Davidson motorcycle.
Gold decals create another visual link between the bicycle and the original Serial Number One.
Harley-Davidson enjoys a 117-year-old reputation in the motorcycle world, and its name resonates all over the globe, so what's the point of building electric bicycles?
Headline: Harley-Davidson announces Serial 1 Cycle Company e-bike brand

text:
Tesla Autopilot safety shows improvement as Full Self Driving fail videos rise. Tesla released its latest Vehicle Safety Report, and it shows a slight improvement in the figures recorded for its Autopilot driving assist technology.
Here's the latest update:In the 3rd quarter, we registered one accident for every 4.59 million miles driven in which drivers had Autopilot engaged.
For those driving without Autopilot but with our active safety features, we registered one accident for every 2.42 million miles driven.
For those driving without Autopilot and without our active safety features, we registered one accident for every 1.79 million miles driven.
By way of comparison, the previous quarter saw one accident for every 4.53 million miles driven with Autopilot.
Headline: Tesla Autopilot safety shows improvement as Full Self Driving fail videos rise
Summary:
Tesla released its latest Vehicle Safety Report, and it shows a slight improvement in the figures recorded for its Autopilot driving assist technology.
Here's the latest update:In the 3rd quarter, we registered one accident for every 4.59 million miles driven in which drivers had Autopilot engaged.
For those driving without Autopilot but with our active safety features, we registered one accident for every 2.42 million miles driven.
For those driving without Autopilot and without our active safety features, we registered one accident for every 1.79 million miles driven.
By way of comparison, the previous quarter saw one accident for every 4.53 million miles driven with Autopilot.

text:
Ford won't offer the 2021 Bronco with donut doors. Enthusiasts who can't wait to put donut doors on their 2021 Ford Bronco will need to find an aftermarket solution, according to a recent report.
Although middle-less doors were shown on some of the Blue Oval's early prototypes, insiders confirmed that safety-related hurdles will prevent this feature from reaching production.
Bronco owners recently convened in the Great Smoky Mountains for a trip on and off the beaten path, and Ford sent several representatives to the event.
Tubular doors will be available directly from Ford, according to the same source, so off-roaders who want to let a little breeze into the cabin won't be out of luck.
We've reached out to Ford for confirmation, and we'll update this story if we learn more.
Headline: Ford won't offer the 2021 Bronco with donut doors
Summary:
Enthusiasts who can't wait to put donut doors on their 2021 Ford Bronco will need to find an aftermarket solution, according to a recent report.
Although middle-less doors were shown on some of the Blue Oval's early prototypes, insiders confirmed that safety-related hurdles will prevent this feature from reaching production.
Bronco owners recently convened in the Great Smoky Mountains for a trip on and off the beaten path, and Ford sent several representatives to the event.
Tubular doors will be available directly from Ford, according to the same source, so off-roaders who want to let a little breeze into the cabin won't be out of luck.
We've reached out to Ford for confirmation, and we'll update this story if we learn more.

text:
Daimler Trucks partners with Waymo to build self-driving semis. Under this deal, Waymo and Daimler Trucks are partnering to build an autonomous version of the Freightliner Cascadia truck.
This deal provides Daimler Trucks, the world's largest maker of commercial vehicles, with Waymo Driver.
In March 2019, Daimler Trucks purchased a majority stake in Torc, another company developing Level 4 self-driving technology for semi-trucks.
Martin Duaum, Chairman of Daimler Truck AG notes the new partnership with Waymo is part of Daimler's "dual strategy approach" by working with two partners to bring customers different options.
Numerous companies are approaching autonomous trucking as its seen as a massive opportunity ready for a technology overhaul.
Headline: Daimler Trucks partners with Waymo to build self-driving semis
Summary:
Under this deal, Waymo and Daimler Trucks are partnering to build an autonomous version of the Freightliner Cascadia truck.
This deal provides Daimler Trucks, the world's largest maker of commercial vehicles, with Waymo Driver.
In March 2019, Daimler Trucks purchased a majority stake in Torc, another company developing Level 4 self-driving technology for semi-trucks.
Martin Duaum, Chairman of Daimler Truck AG notes the new partnership with Waymo is part of Daimler's "dual strategy approach" by working with two partners to bring customers different options.
Numerous companies are approaching autonomous trucking as its seen as a massive opportunity ready for a technology overhaul.

text:
The Donkervoort D8 GTO-JD70 R is only for the track, costs $230K. If the Donkervoort D8 GTO-JD70 wasn’t extreme enough for you, Donkervoort has news you’ll want to hear today.
With the R, Donkervoort says it’s up to 2.25 Gs.
You may need stronger neck muscles to effectively drive this car on track.
It gets stiffer four-way adjustable dampers, stiffer springs, stiffer bushings, stiffer anti-roll bars and a lower ride height.
The D8 GTO-JD70 R is 55 pounds heavier than the standard car, but that means it still only weighs 1,598 pounds.
Headline: The Donkervoort D8 GTO-JD70 R is only for the track, costs $230K
Summary:
If the Donkervoort D8 GTO-JD70 wasn’t extreme enough for you, Donkervoort has news you’ll want to hear today.
With the R, Donkervoort says it’s up to 2.25 Gs.
You may need stronger neck muscles to effectively drive this car on track.
It gets stiffer four-way adjustable dampers, stiffer springs, stiffer bushings, stiffer anti-roll bars and a lower ride height.
The D8 GTO-JD70 R is 55 pounds heavier than the standard car, but that means it still only weighs 1,598 pounds.

2021 BMW X5 Review | Price, specs, features and photos. As this segment demands, it can also be had with superlative levels of German performance in the X5 M50i and X5 M .
Opting for an X5 M only adds to the customizability of the driving experience.
It also features M Sport brakes, adaptive M suspension, M Sport differential and 20-inch wheels.
Rounding out the X5 lineup is the X5 M and X5 M Competition.
An X5 M gets to 60 mph in just 3.8 seconds, and the Competition drops that to 3.7 seconds.

text:
Bugatti previews W16-powered race car. Bugatti captured our attention when it released an image of an enigmatic new model whose rear lights form an X.
Significantly, the digital rendering shows the car is built around the quad-turbocharged W16 that powers the Chiron.
All of these parts look like they belong in a race car, but Bugatti is keeping additional details under wraps.
If this is indeed a track car, is it 0.67 seconds quicker than the Chiron around a given track?
0.67 seconds quicker to 60 mph is plausible.
Headline: Bugatti previews W16-powered race car
Summary:
Bugatti captured our attention when it released an image of an enigmatic new model whose rear lights form an X.
Significantly, the digital rendering shows the car is built around the quad-turbocharged W16 that powers the Chiron.
All of these parts look like they belong in a race car, but Bugatti is keeping additional details under wraps.
If this is indeed a track car, is it 0.67 seconds quicker than the Chiron around a given track?
0.67 seconds quicker to 60 mph is plausible.

text:
Detroit automakers keep their masks on to keep the factories running. (AP)DETROIT — When the coronavirus pandemic slammed the United States in March, the Detroit Three automakers shut their plants and brought their North American vehicle production to an unprecedented cold stop.
For automakers, the automakers' COVID response has been as much about instilling new habits as relying on new technology.
"The biggest complaint is wearing a mask," United Auto Workers President Rory Gamble told Reuters.
At GM's Factory Zero in Detroit, UAW skilled trades worker Scott Harwick said the mask wearing debate outside the plant isn't an issue inside.
The Detroit automakers test workers who exhibit symptoms associated with coronavirus infection, but have not adopted widespread testing for their 156,000 factory workers.
Headline: Detroit automakers keep their masks on to keep the factories running
Summary:
(AP)DETROIT — When the coronavirus pandemic slammed the United States in March, the Detroit Three automakers shut their plants and brought their North American vehicle production to an unprecedented cold stop.
For automakers, the automakers' COVID response has been as much about instilling new habits as relying on new technology.
"The biggest complaint is wearing a mask," United Auto Workers President Rory Gamble told Reuters.
At GM's Factory Zero in Detroit, UAW skilled trades worker Scott Harwick said the mask wearing debate outside the plant isn't an issue inside.
The Detroit automakers test workers who exhibit symptoms associated with coronavirus infection, but have not adopted widespread testing for their 156,000 factory workers.

text:
Harley-Davidson's U.S. sales slide 10% but profit beats expectations. Harley-Davidson beat profit expectations on Tuesday as shipments improved from pandemic lows and it reined in costs as part of Chief Executive Officer Jochen Zeitz's restructuring plan, sending its shares up 9% before the bell.
Retail sales in its biggest market, the United States, where Harley has not recorded a sales rise for the past six years, fell 10% from a year earlier, but was much less than the 27% slide in the second quarter.
Net income rose to $120 million, or 78 cents per share, in the third quarter ended Sept. 30, from $87 million, or 55 cents per share, a year earlier.
On an adjusted basis, it earned $1.05 cents per share, according to Refinitiv data.
Motorcycles and related product revenue fell to $964 million from $1.07 billion a year earlier.
Headline: Harley-Davidson's U.S. sales slide 10% but profit beats expectations
Summary:
Harley-Davidson beat profit expectations on Tuesday as shipments improved from pandemic lows and it reined in costs as part of Chief Executive Officer Jochen Zeitz's restructuring plan, sending its shares up 9% before the bell.
Retail sales in its biggest market, the United States, where Harley has not recorded a sales rise for the past six years, fell 10% from a year earlier, but was much less than the 27% slide in the second quarter.
Net income rose to $120 million, or 78 cents per share, in the third quarter ended Sept. 30, from $87 million, or 55 cents per share, a year earlier.
On an adjusted basis, it earned $1.05 cents per share, according to Refinitiv data.
Motorcycles and related product revenue fell to $964 million from $1.07 billion a year earlier.

text:
Jaguar Land Rover parent Tata posts a loss over coronavirus. BENGALURU — India's Tata Motors posted a wider loss for the September quarter on Tuesday as the COVID-19 pandemic sapped demand in several of its key markets.
The global health crisis has hammered sales for automakers worldwide and compounded problems for Tata Motors, which was trying to improve Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) sales amid weak demand and uncertainty related to Brexit.
Tata Motors, however, said it expects JLR sales to gradually improve.
Tata Motors said it was committed to achieving near-zero net automotive debt in the coming years.
Shares of Tata Motors ended 1.46% higher on Tuesday while the broader Mumbai market settled 1.03% higher.
Headline: Jaguar Land Rover parent Tata posts a loss over coronavirus
Summary:
BENGALURU — India's Tata Motors posted a wider loss for the September quarter on Tuesday as the COVID-19 pandemic sapped demand in several of its key markets.
The global health crisis has hammered sales for automakers worldwide and compounded problems for Tata Motors, which was trying to improve Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) sales amid weak demand and uncertainty related to Brexit.
Tata Motors, however, said it expects JLR sales to gradually improve.
Tata Motors said it was committed to achieving near-zero net automotive debt in the coming years.
Shares of Tata Motors ended 1.46% higher on Tuesday while the broader Mumbai market settled 1.03% higher.

text:
2021 Toyota Sienna First Drive | Functional efficiency with style. Then there’s the new, totally redesigned 2021 Toyota Sienna.
Although the Sienna's second-row seats already slid further fore and aft than its competitors, Toyota lengthened their travel even further for 2021.
The Sienna, like Pacifica, also offers a surround view parking camera, which is helpful navigating small parking lots with a big minivan.
Sienna has a small sunroof over the front row, but there’s no panoramic sunroof option to bring in more light to the rear passengers.
The Sienna gets a suite of standard driving assist features called Toyota Safety Sense 2.0.
Headline: 2021 Toyota Sienna First Drive | Functional efficiency with style
Summary:
Then there’s the new, totally redesigned 2021 Toyota Sienna.
Although the Sienna's second-row seats already slid further fore and aft than its competitors, Toyota lengthened their travel even further for 2021.
The Sienna, like Pacifica, also offers a surround view parking camera, which is helpful navigating small parking lots with a big minivan.
Sienna has a small sunroof over the front row, but there’s no panoramic sunroof option to bring in more light to the rear passengers.
The Sienna gets a suite of standard driving assist features called Toyota Safety Sense 2.0.

text:
Hummer EV to be sold at only about half of GMC dealerships. The new 1,000-horsepower Hummer EV will be sold under the GMC brand, but you won't find it in every GMC showroom.
Currently, just about half of GMC's dealers have agreed to take on the electric truck, Buick GMC VP Duncan Aldred told investors on a conference call last week.
At $112,595, the initial Hummer EV Edition 1 caters to a different clientele than the traditional GMC truck.
Furthermore, not all GMC dealerships are located in areas with customers willing to shell out that much cabbage for a new vehicle, especially an EV.
Still, GMC appears to have no problem moving all the Hummer EVs it can build.
Headline: Hummer EV to be sold at only about half of GMC dealerships
Summary:
The new 1,000-horsepower Hummer EV will be sold under the GMC brand, but you won't find it in every GMC showroom.
Currently, just about half of GMC's dealers have agreed to take on the electric truck, Buick GMC VP Duncan Aldred told investors on a conference call last week.
At $112,595, the initial Hummer EV Edition 1 caters to a different clientele than the traditional GMC truck.
Furthermore, not all GMC dealerships are located in areas with customers willing to shell out that much cabbage for a new vehicle, especially an EV.
Still, GMC appears to have no problem moving all the Hummer EVs it can build.

text:
The latest flying car prototype undergoes runway testing. A flying car outfit says that its V4-powered vehicle has achieved 88 mph on a runway.
Like Doc Brown's DeLorean in "Back to the Future Part II," the Samson Sky Switchblade starts out on asphalt before transforming into its flying mode.
According to Samson Sky, the vehicle can be driven on regular streets, classified as a motorcycle, to your neighborhood regional airport.
From there, you can hit the skies for a cruising speed of 160 mph, though the top speed is 190 mph according to Samson Sky.
The Switchblade claims a range of 500 miles, which Samson Sky says cuts a 500-mile trip down to 3.5 hours.
Headline: The latest flying car prototype undergoes runway testing

Like Doc Brown's DeLorean in "Back to the Future Part II," the Samson Sky Switchblade starts out on asphalt before transforming into its flying mode.

The Switchblade claims a range of 500 miles, which Samson Sky says cuts a 500-mile trip down to 3.5 hours.
